Trade/Device Name(s): AlphaID At Home Genetic Health Risk Service
AlphaIDTM At Home Genetic Health Risk Service
AlphaIDTm At Home Genetic Health Risk Service
Specimen Container(s): AlphaID At Home Saliva Collection kit
Instrument(s)/Platform(s): AlphaID System website and result portal
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for AlphaID At Home Genetic Health Risk Service, a qualitative genotyping test for 14 SERPINA1 gene variants associated with alpha-1 antitrypsin deficiency (AATD) using saliva samples and Luminex 200 system
Indications for Use Summary: For qualitative genotyping of 14 SERPINA1 gene variants associated with alpha-1 antitrypsin deficiency in individuals 18 years and older using saliva samples for reporting and interpreting genetic health risks; for over-the-counter use, not diagnostic, results to be discussed with healthcare professional.
